responses.response: Hi there! Welcome to the JomMakan food ordering service. How can I assist you today?
I'm good, and always here to answer your questions. Thanks for asking!
Sure, let me help you explore our menu. You can type 'show me the menu' to see our available dishes.
To check your order status, you can go to 'Order history' from the 'Me' page.
Delivery times may vary based on your location. You can check the estimated delivery time during checkout.
We accept various payment methods, including credit cards, e-wallets, and cash on delivery.
If you need assistance, feel free to ask! You can inquire about the menu, track your order, or ask for help with any issues.
Our stalls are open from 7 AM to 5 PM every Monday to Saturday.
Our delivery services are open from 10 AM to 5 PM every Monday to Friday.
You can place an order by adding your desired foods to the cart and tap on the Checkout button in the cart page.
